request.description:
Endpoint to register a new admin user.

POST body (as JSON) - 
username: String
firstname: String
lastname: String
email: String (properly formatted)
phone: Int (between 1000000000 and 9999999999)
password: String

Response (on successful registration) - 
```
{
    "message": "New admin registered",
    "admin": {
        "id": "___id____",
        "username": "___username____",
        "firstname": "___first_name____",
        "lastname": "___last_name____",
        "email": "___email____",
        "phone": "___phone____",
        "passwordHash": "___password_hash____",
        "token": "___token____",
        "adminToken": "___admin_token____"
    }
}
```

request.description:
Endpoint for admin user to login.

POST body (as JSON) - 
email: String (properly formatted)
password: String

Response (on successful login) - 
```
{
    "message": "New admin registered",
    "admin": {
        "id": "___id____",
        "username": "___username____",
        "firstname": "___first_name____",
        "lastname": "___last_name____",
        "email": "___email____",
        "phone": "___phone____",
        "passwordHash": "___password_hash____",
        "token": "___token____",
        "adminToken": "___admin_token____"
    }
}
```
